DataElement.preferredName: Patient Fulfill Criterion New Maintenance Therapy Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No indicator of whether patient fulfilled criteria for new maintenance therapy.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Fulfill Criterion New Maintenance Therapy
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:Satisfy the requirements or expectations of._That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison._Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before._Continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Satisfy the requirements or expectations of._That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison._Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before._Continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse.

Concepts.definition: Satisfy the requirements or expectations of.
That which constitutes a standard from which a judgment can be established, a reference point against which other things can be evaluated, or a basis for comparison.
Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.
Continuation of treatment for an extended period of time to prevent relapse.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Response of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/15/08 - Associated NCIt concets for Yes/No instead of Meta.  Superceded existing VD.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient meet the criteria for starting/resuming a new cycle of maintenance treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient meet the criteria for starting/resuming a new cycle of maintenance treatment in section 6.1.1.
